title: Expansion of OPD and Clinics - Phase I Stage II - Construction of the Superstructure of the Building at the National Eye Hospital, Colombo 10
decision_details: -  the proposal made by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, Minister of Health, to award the above tender to the lowest responsive bidder at a total cost of Rs.144,283,027.62, as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
